name: booking-employees
description: Employee booking platform for WordPress integration

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.reseed: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const mongoose = require('mongoose'); const Employee = require('./server/models/Employee'); const seedData = require('./server/utils/seedData'); mongoose.connect(process.env.MONGODB_URI || 'mongodb://localhost:27017/bookingEmployees', {useNewUrlParser: true, useUnifiedTopology: true}).then(() => {console.log('Connected'); return Employee.deleteMany({});}).then(() => seedData()).then(() => {mongoose.connection.close(); process.exit(0);}).catch(err => {console.error(err); process.exit(1);});"
